co.paralleluniverse.actors

Class ActorLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • co.paralleluniverse.actors.ActorLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActorLoaderMXBean, NotificationBroadcaster, NotificationEmitter

    public class ActorLoader
extends ClassLoader
implements ActorLoaderMXBean, NotificationEmitter
    Loads actor, and actor-related classes for hot code-swapping.
